Package com.designPatterns.StartegyPattern

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PaymentStrategy
    PaymentStrategy define the parameters and rules which decides which algorithm would be selected at runtime.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreditCardStrategy
    CreditCardStrategy implements PaymentStrategy by paying the input amount parameter through credit card.
    Item
    Item defines a POJO class for the declaration of an Item object.
    PaypalStrategy
    Implementation of the payment strategy.
    ShoppingCart
    This class maintains the list of items and add them to list of items and calculates the total amount and pays the amount by selecting the proper payment strategy.
    StrategyPatternDemo
    This class demonstrates the use of Strategy Pattern.
